title: Project Sign-off
description: An implementation project has been completed, and the consultant needs to get formal sign-off from the customer.

tasks.description: Review the original SOW to ensure all deliverables have been met.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant confirms the project is complete.

tasks.description: Prepare a project completion document summarizing the work done and outcomes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant creates the final sign-off document.

tasks.description: Send the document to the customer for their final signature to officially close the project.
